Tender Notice #53500-23-4157958 – Pharmacy Services
=============================================

### Background Information

Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is soliciting pharmacy services for the residents of Pê Sâkâstêw Centre in Alberta. Required services include medication dispensing, pharmaceutical support, and advisory services.

### Tender Description

To provide pharmacy and pharmaceutical services to the residents of Pê Sâkâstêw Centre, a facility and personnel licensed and registered in the province of Alberta must be provided.

*   Deliver a "Unit Dose" system for dispensing medication, which includes blister packaging for over-the-counter and prescribed medications for individual use.
*   Obtain yearly licenses for all registered employees and provide proof in accordance with Accreditation Canada standards.
*   Fill prescriptions in blister packages and make them available for delivery upon an agreed upon time and day with CSC's Health Services team.
*   Prepare, label, and dispense Methadone prescriptions (if applicable) in bottles with a security seal.
*   Provide generic equivalents to prescribed drugs whenever possible and request advice from the prescribing physician if a particular drug is out of stock.
*   Follow the CSC National Formulary and comply with the requirements for justification of non-formulary products.
*   Dispose of unused or outdated drugs from the CSC stock and provide credit where applicable.
*   Provide consulting and advisory services as and when requested by the CSC Project Authority.
*   Offer consulting services and problem-solving advice to CSC Health Care services staff on routine and emergency issues.

### Requirements

*   A facility and personnel licensed and registered in the province of Alberta.
*   The Contractor must follow the CS National Formulary.
*   The Contractor must obtain yearly licenses for all registered employees.
